trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003330_RAUBAHN<tab>There have been several skirmishes along the border, but as yet, neither side has delivered a decisive blow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003340_RAUBAHN<tab>We had long assumed that the Garleans would overwhelm us in a straight fight, but we seem to be gaining ground, albeit slowly.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003350_RAUBAHN<tab>As to why that might be... The most likely explanation is that they have yet to commit all their forces. Still, we're winning, and our latest intelligence suggests the Emperor has retreated back to Garlemald.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003360_RAUBAHN<tab>In light of this, we're considering launching an offensive, with the aim of pushing the front line forward, and giving ourselves some room to breathe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003370_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Commander! The imperials─they've broken through our defenses to the east.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003380_RAUBAHN<tab>What!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003390_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Our scouts say their forces are being led by Lord Zenos!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003400_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Lord Hien and Commander Hext have taken their troops to provide support, but we don't know how long they can hold out.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003410_RAUBAHN<tab>So they've been biding their time, waiting for his arrival, have they?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003420_RAUBAHN<tab>Very well. Send word to our allies, requesting reinforcements for the front line.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003430_RAUBAHN<tab>Should the worst come to the worst, I may need to enter the fray myself. But what of you? Do you still have the strength to fight?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You need only say the word.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>So long as you leave the Ascian to me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003440_RAUBAHN<tab>Much obliged. Given the choice, I'd take you over a hundred soldiers.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003450_RAUBAHN<tab>He may not <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var> as such, but to see Lord Zenos fall on the battlefield would deal a heavy blow to imperial morale. I'll see to it the men stay clear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Why won't they open?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Please... I bid you, open...!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003480_RAUBAHN<tab>What's wrong? Is it the voice again?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003490_RAUBAHN<tab>Are you sure you're in a fit state to do this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003500_RAUBAHN<tab>May Rhalgr grant us strength...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003510_RAUBAHN<tab>Give them hell, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. I, for my part, will defend this place to my dying breath.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003515_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, at the border of Ala Mhigo...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003520_HIEN<tab>[GROAN]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003530_YUGIRI<tab>Fall, fiend!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003540_YUGIRI<tab>[PAINED SCREAM]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003550_HIEN<tab>Yugiri!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003560_HIEN<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003570_LYSE<tab>Damn you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003571_LYSE<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003580_RESISTANCEFIGHTER<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003590_HIEN<tab>Magic? With a Garlean body? That's hardly fair...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003600_HIEN<tab>Still, he must be stopped...no matter the cost...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003610_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ah, Bringer of Light. It has been too long.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003620_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)No words to mark our reunion? ...So be it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003630_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Equilibrium must be restored... And only your death will redress the balance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003640_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Your Mother chose Her champion well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003650_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Yet for all your strength, you will still fail.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003660_ROBEMAN<tab>[DERISIVE SNORT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Please... I beseech you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003680_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hm? Someone calls to you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003690_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Too late, alas.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)At last, I've found you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Please! There is no cause for alarm!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Though, I confess, this is not where I had intended to meet.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But the place of our meeting is of no consequence─like the war you wage. Win or lose, the path you walk leads only to oblivion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The better path leads you here. To me. I have need of your strength.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Who are you!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You have to send me back, now!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am afraid such questions will have to wait. We have precious little time, and your work is not yet done.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The battle is over. The danger passed. But your work is not yet done.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Go to the Crystal Tower. I have left something for you near its base.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It will serve as a beacon of sorts. One which I pray will help you on your journey.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>All you need do is find it. I will take care of the rest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Soon we will throw wide the gates...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And the path to the First will be yours to walk at last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003820_AYMERIC<tab>You're awake. Thank heavens!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What happened?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Where is Zenos?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003830_AYMERIC<tab>Do you recall the confrontation with Zenos? You were the first to come to the aid of Mistress Lyse and the others on the front line.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003840_AYMERIC<tab>I see you recall that much, at least.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003850_AYMERIC<tab>In the midst of your duel, it is said you faltered, and that the crown prince seized the opportunity to deliver a mortal blow.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003860_AYMERIC<tab>Yet before his blade could find its mark, he was distracted by the arrival of a second adversary who bore you away from the battlefield and into the hands of our chirurgeons.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003870_AYMERIC<tab>Lest you wonder, he left before you awoke. As is his wont.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003880_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien never was one for emotional farewells.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003890_AYMERIC<tab>Though Zenos bested all before him, the battle clearly took its toll, for he retreated shortly after your rescue. Seeing this, the remaining imperial forces decided discretion was the better part of valor and pulled back, allowing us to reestablish our position.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003900_AYMERIC<tab>We have since received word of renewed unrest in the provinces, doubtless inspired by the efforts of the Eorzean Alliance and our Far Eastern allies.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003910_AYMERIC<tab>Nor does the good news end there. We have also come into possession of intelligence suggesting unrest within the imperial court.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003920_AYMERIC<tab>This would certainly explain why both the Emperor and Lord Zenos appear to have abandoned the fight.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003930_AYMERIC<tab>A long-awaited ray of hope in these dark times.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is Alisaie all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What of the Scions?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003940_AYMERIC<tab>Yet to awake, I'm afraid. But, please...concentrate on your own recovery for now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003950_AYMERIC<tab>You have carried the hopes of some half-dozen nations─and we are all eternally grateful for your efforts─but no one is without their limits. Not even you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003960_AYMERIC<tab>Leave this fight to us, my friend. You have earned your rest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003970_AYMERIC<tab>Ah, but before I forget...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003980_AYMERIC<tab>I was asked to deliver a message as soon as you awoke.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003990_AYMERIC<tab>A reminder that you are not alone, though many of your allies have fallen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004000_AYMERIC<tab>When you are well and rested, you are to return home, where friends will be waiting for you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004010_AYMERIC<tab>Now, if you will excuse me, I must return to the front. May we meet again soon. Under happier circumstances.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004020_TATARU<tab>By the Twelve, I don't believe it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004030_TATARU<tab>[SOFTLY SOBBING]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004040_TATARU<tab>I rushed back as soon as I could.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004050_TATARU<tab>I swear, my heart nearly stopped when I heard you'd collapsed like the others. What in heavens' name is going on?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004060_TATARU<tab>“Win or lose, the path you walk leads only to oblivion.” ...Well, that's helpful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004070_TATARU<tab>And what else did he say? The better path leads to him? Hmm...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004080_TATARU<tab>If his is the voice you've all been hearing, perhaps the others are with him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004090_TATARU<tab>Ser Aymeric said the fighting had reached a stalemate, didn't he.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004100_TATARU<tab>But if that monster masquerading as Zenos comes back...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004110_TATARU<tab>Thancred, Y'shtola, Urianger, Alphinaud, Alisaie... You're going to need all of them on your side to defeat him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004120_TATARU<tab>And I forbid you from going to face him on your own. Do you hear me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004130_TATARU<tab>So if you must leave... Go and find the others. Bring them home.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004140_TATARU<tab>As for where to start, you said the stranger had left a beacon for you at the Crystal Tower, right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004150_TATARU<tab>Well, it's not as if you haven't been there before...but I'm guessing “near its base” doesn't narrow things down very much.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004160_TATARU<tab>But how are you to find it now that the tower has been sealed shut?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004170_TATARU<tab>But I'm sure I remember hearing that the tower was blocked off?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004180_TATARU<tab>There has to be a way... If anyone would know, it's Cid and the researchers of Saint Coinach's Find.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004190_TATARU<tab>Don't you worry. We'll find that beacon for you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004200_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the imperial palace...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004210_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)...I pray you have good reason for abandoning the front.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004220_VARIS<tab>How could I remain there while the rumor that my son is possessed by a demon spreads like a sickness here at home?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004230_VARIS<tab>I will not be made to fight for the throne a second time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004240_VARIS<tab>But what of you? Did you not tell me you would destroy Eorzea's champion with the ease that one might swat a fly?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004250_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)A minor setback. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will not escape me again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004260_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Where is your grandsire? I would have words with him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004270_VARIS<tab>How should I know? Do you hide from each other's sight as well? I imagine he is doing what all Ascians do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004280_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hmmm... He must have found a way to take advantage of this turmoil.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004290_VARIS<tab>Men are not pawns to be played with, Ascian. You underestimate us at your peril.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004300_VARIS<tab>This war will not be decided by you and yours. Man must choose his own fate, and I, for my part, will do all within my power to see Garlemald emerge victorious.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004310_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>Pray forgive the intrusion, Your Radiance, but the requested preparations are now complete.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004320_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>We stand ready to begin production of Black Rose, upon your order.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004330_KATANASOLDIER<tab>My enemy. My friend. Had I been but a step faster...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004340_IMPERIALSOLDIER04505<tab>Bloody savages!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004350_IMPERIALSOLDIER04505<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004360_KATANASOLDIER<tab>A pity your hunt leads you elsewhere... Not that I am surprised.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004370_KATANASOLDIER<tab>May you find joy in it. Grow stronger, more savage, and savor every triumph...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004380_KATANASOLDIER<tab>In the meantime...I will reclaim that which is rightfully mine.
